definition: to attain/to reach/to amount to/to communicate/eminent

mark/sign/label/to mark with a symbol, label, lettering etc/to bear (a brand name, registration number etc)/prize/award/bid/target/quota/(old) the topmost branches of a tree/visible symptom/classifier for military units
physical fitness test (for school students etc)
pinyin: ti3 yu4 da2 biao1 ce4 yan4

sentences.english: Self-examination and assessment results show that the quality of data related to the work of full compliance.
sentences.chinese: 自查评估结果显示，相关工作的数据质量全面达标。

sentences.english: Intake below-standard purity automatic emptying, adsorption tower.
sentences.chinese: 进气纯度不达标自动排空，吸附塔。

sentences.english: Levels of blood glucose and nursing effect were observed.
sentences.chinese: 观察患者血糖达标情况及护理巡诊管理的效果。

sentences.english: Nearly half the world's population do not have access to adequate sanitation.
sentences.chinese: 全球人口中约一半生活在卫生条件不达标的环境中。

sentences.english: The results of the sample for the test have shown that the quantity of fatty substance in milk is appropriate to the standard.
sentences.chinese: 采样检验的结果表明牛奶中的脂肪含量达标。

sentences.english: Studentswho do not complete internship or fail to meet internship requirements will notbe awarded credit.
sentences.chinese: 不能按期完成实习或实习考核未达标者不能授予学分。

sentences.english: However, six conditions causing low temperature will receive no returns.
sentences.chinese: 不过，有六种情况不达标也不退费。

sentences.english: Sports achievement reaches the standard , physical constitution is good, be suitable to hard environment school assignment.
sentences.chinese: 体育成绩达标，身体素质好，适合艰苦环境作业。

sentences.english: His ambition has been crushed by the daily struggle to meet targets.
sentences.chinese: 然而他的雄心已被每日为达标而进行的挣扎碾得粉碎。

sentences.english: Additionally, there will be inspections, and those who fail to meet targets will "be severely dealt with."
sentences.chinese: 并将逐一检查，未能达标者“一律严肃处理。”

sentences.english: It is, as he says, a short circuiting of the body.
sentences.chinese: 这就是，如他所说的，一种未达标的身体循环过程。

sentences.english: Or that they don't rely on their own private goon squads to brutalize local residents into meeting whatever targets have been set?
sentences.chinese: 或者保证他们不会依靠私家暴徒蹂躏当地居民以达标？

sentences.english: For vertical cement kiln plants, whether the dust emission reaches the standard or not may be an existence-determining problem.
sentences.chinese: 对粉尘进行达标治理，是决定立窑水泥生存的大问题。

sentences.english: The ward at night nurses the quality success rate 100%.
sentences.chinese: 病区夜间护理质量达标率100%。

sentences.english: Most have either met their targets or are close to doing so.
sentences.chinese: 目前，大部分银行已经达到了标准或是接近达标。

sentences.english: If this is the standard, I did fail to reach the standard.
sentences.chinese: 如果以此标准来衡量的话，我确实还未达标。

definition: to cross the limit/to be over the accepted norm/excessive
to meet the standard required/qualified/eligible (voter etc)
to examine/to check up on/to assess/to review/appraisal/review/evaluation
in keeping with/in accordance with/tallying with/in line with/to agree with/to accord with/to conform to/to correspond with/to manage/to handle
